title: N/A: 1910 Sporty Postal Card Co Philadelphia Athletics
author: Kris19

posts.post_title: N/A: 1910 Sporty Postal Card Co Philadelphia Athletics
posts.post_content:
Composite team postcard depicting the faces of each of the 1910 Philadelphia Athletics inside a white elephant.  Each of the players are identified at the bottom of the card, including Hall of Famers Connie Mack, Eddie Plank, Chief Bender, Eddie Collins, and Home Run Baker.  

Postally used in September 1911, creases in the upper right, some toning, slight post marks and paper loss on the front, and general wear.

N/A delivered, payment by PayPal F/F please.

Please PM or email [url]kris.sweckard@sbcglobal.net[/url]
